item.title: Panic At The Disco - I Write Sins Not Tragedies
item.description:
Oh!
well imagine
As I’m pacing the pews
in a church corridor
And I can’t help
but to hear
No I can’t help
but to hear
An exchanging
of words
What a beautiful
wedding!
What a beautiful
wedding!
Says a bridesmaid
to a waiter
And yes
but what a shame
What a shame
the poor
Groom’s bride
is a whore
I chime in with a
haven’t you people
Ever heard of closing
a goddamn door no
It’s much better
to face these
Kinds of things
with a sense of
Poise and
rationality

haven’t you people

a goddamn door no
It’s much better
to face these
Kinds of things
with a sense of
Well in fact well I’ll
look at it this way
I mean technically
our marriage is saved
Well this calls
for a toast
So pour
the champagne
